front.title: LSP Attributes Related Routing Backus-Naur Form

abstract.t: Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) Label Switched Paths (LSPs)established using the Resource Reservation Protocol TrafficEngineering (RSVP-TE) extensions may be signaled with a set of LSPspecific attributes. These attributes may be carried in both Pathand Resv messages. This document specifies how LSP attributes areto be carried in RSVP Path and Resv messages using the RoutingBackus-Naur Form, and clarifies related Resv message formats.
